amendment.description: To strike certain authorities relating to the use for grants of funds of the Office of Economic Assistance of the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: To strike certain authorities relating to the use for grants of funds of the Office of Economic Assistance of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Amendment SA 33 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 26.
Motion to table amendment SA 33 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 35.

vote.text: Amendment SA 33 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
